title: Can a Rioter play my 1000th normal win with me? :D
body:
Hi.

I remember way back when Rioters would often play with players who posted on the League forums for the 1000th win. I'd love the same chance to play my 1000th normal win (maybe two games, if I do bad xD) with one of the OCE staff. 

Much love, please hit me up if you wanna play. :D

IGN: Scarred

Probably around tomorrow 6:30-7:00PM QLD time, or around the same time Wednesday. :D Much love.

replies.body:
Spell BOTH our names wrong?!?!?! wow.

Yo Scarred can play a game at 7pm QLD time
Happy to play as well if you need more!
That'd be great! 7pm Qld it is! Thanks guys! :D
Get me in on this action! =D
Hey tried to add you in-client! Guessing you might be out/at work but let us know if you can play a touch earlier!
Hey! I should be around to play in about 25-30 minutes. :)
It was LATE!!!! Forgive me senpai!
I was totally planning on doing this for my recent 1000th win but TOTALLY FORGOT:( Rip me

Super awkward loss. xD

THANKS FOR PLAYING GUYS!!! :D <3
